title: Roy Lichtenstein
creator_credit: Geoffrey Haydon, Barrie Gavin, Julia Cave and British Broadcasting Corporation
brief_description: Presents Roy Lichtenstein at work in his studio and indicates the sources of his inspiration and his artistic philosophies. Covers the development of his work from the sixties onwards. Photography by Fintan Sheehan. Sound by John Tellick and Tony Anscombe. Edited by Ben Morris Rostrum. Cinematography by Ken Morse.
